text: Tm telemarketer called me today.Saying TM will stop streamyx around October this year.He expalined what unifi is, etc etc But never mentions the price.Only after i asked what the monthly payments are, he reluctantly said RM179, since he's calling from TM office in PJ.30mbps with free installation.I saw the RM179 price near my Giant supermarket for quite some time already though.Big question, is TM shutting down Streamyx?
nope... just telemarketer strategy for u to update

I believe this is bs. Not every location have fiber. Why need to shut down service since the copper wire already existed with no additional cost and able to make money. This is just telemarketer tactic to get customer. If reported to TM I guess the contract will be terminated
tM wont shutdown streamyx la..since is gain more profit from there..compared to unifi...

He told me nowadays many people complains Streamyx have many connection problems, thus moving every Streamyx user to fiber solves the issue.No idea if it's mandatory to move to unifi or optional.I decline his offer.Astro also used this tricks, saying there would no longer be SD service in the near future, so everyone will upgrade to HD.I hope all telemarketers who lie dies of starvation
they need to lie as their stupid manager set the KPI based on Sales Basis.

hahaha... that HD excuse is BS to be honestthey use that tactic because normally in stremxy area there also unifi liteso basically not mandatory since when u move, u will need to have new contract with TM hence comission to them so don't fall for this shit telemarketer tactic bro unless u don't mind new contract with TM

Incorrect to say no need additional cost to maintain. Copper cables got stolen , DSLAMS that need to maintain, duplication of services (Unifi and streamyx) , and ultimately the declining revenue from streamyx. Cannot be upgraded to charge more...It's like 3G and 4G networks , telcos have stopped investing in 3G now, and giving perks for customers to migrate to 4G
Ha ah, my neighbour already got Unifi when it came out.I'm still on 4mbps at RM137.

Stolen is another story. Even the fiber optic cables were cut thinking it was copper many times. If the area has fiber laid, of course the copper service will be terminated. However, for areas that have yet to be laid with fiber, the Streamyx will still be maintained because it is an obligation promised by govt to make sure wide coverage of "broadband".

ditch Streamyx dude.go for Unifi. I just got mine yesterday. 30mbps download, 10mbps upload.i couldnt be more happier after waiting for almost 4 years for a decent tiang telefon to be installed at my taman. Previously, they said streamyx but then later, streamyx project cancelled at my taman and got Unifi instead.
